# Dotfiles

Dotfiles to manage everything, powered by [nix](https://nix.dev/).

## Generated files

The following files in this repository are generated and checked
using [the _files_ flake-parts module](https://github.com/mightyiam/files):

- `README.md`
- `.gitignore`
